group.name: Torvaldsland 2
group.shortDescription: Pure chaos sim with friendly aliens and shenanigans.
group.longDescription: Discover a place full of wonders and buildings to visit, take a car for a spin in this interactive and friendly homeworld of AFKEA and more.

group.name: Stargate Command
group.shortDescription: Visit the iconic Stargate SG-1 base.
group.longDescription: The Stargate Command (SGC) is a top-secret military organization located in the Cheyenne Mountain Complex in Colorado. It is responsible for operating the Stargate and all off-world activities involving it. The facility is equipped with multiple levels, interactions and NPCs.

group.name: Abydos
group.shortDescription: Where the Goa'ulds used to reign, no more.
group.longDescription: Abydos was the destination of Earth's first Stargate mission, where Daniel Jackson met his wife Sha're. The desert world's Egyptian-styled population lived under Goa'uld rule until freed by SG-1.

group.name: Atlantis
group.shortDescription: The city of the Atlants, also called the 'Ancients'.
group.longDescription: Atlantis is a massive city-ship built by the Ancients millions of years ago. It served as their capital in the Pegasus Galaxy. The city is highly advanced, featuring zero-point module power systems, and more...

group.name: Icarus
group.shortDescription: The remote advanced base of the Stargate Program.
group.longDescription: Icarus Base was established on a remote planet with a highly volatile naquadria core. Its sole purpose was to provide the massive amount of energy required to dial the nine-chevron address found in the Ancient database.

group.name: Midway Station
group.shortDescription: The first space station created by the Tau'ri Stargate Program.
group.longDescription: The Midway Station was built in intergalactic space to provide a secure stopover for Stargate travel between Earth and Atlantis, housing Stargates from both galaxies. The station's strategic importance made it a Wraith target who attempted to reach Earth through it, ultimately leading to its destruction to prevent invasion.

group.name: Othala
group.shortDescription: The homeworld of the little greys.
group.longDescription: Othala is the Asgard homeworld, a highly advanced planet serving as the political, scientific, and cultural center of the Asgard.
